00018 #include "cmodulechooserbutton.h"
00019 #include "../../resource.h"
00020 #include "../../backend/cswordbackend.h"
00021 
00022 //Qt includes
00023 #include <qstring.h>
00024 #include <qtooltip.h>
00025 
00026 //KDE includes
00027 #include <kpopupmenu.h>
00028 #include <klocale.h>
00029 
00030 CModuleChooserButton::CModuleChooserButton(CSwordModuleInfo* useModule,CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type, const int id, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00031     : QToolButton(parent,name) {
00032     qDebug("CModuleChooserButton::CModuleCHooserButton");
00033 
00034     m_id = id;
00035     m_moduleType = type;    
00036     m_module = useModule;
00037     if (!m_module)
00038     m_hasModule = false;
00039   else
00040     m_hasModule = true;
00041     
00042     setPixmap( icon() );
00043     setPopupDelay(0);
00044     
00045     //create popup
00046     m_popup = new KPopupMenu(this); 
00047     setPopup(m_popup);
00048     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Select additional modules"));
00049     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00050     m_popup->insertItem(i18n("NONE"));
00051     m_popup->insertSeparator(); 
00052     connect(m_popup, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(moduleChosen(int)));
00053     ListCSwordModuleInfo* modules = backend()->moduleList();
00054     for (modules->first(); modules->current(); modules->next()) {
00055         if (modules->current()->type() == m_moduleType) {
00056             m_popup->insertItem( modules->current()->name() );
00057         }
00058     }   
00059     //Check the appropriate entry
00060     if (m_module) {
00061         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00062             if (m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) == m_module->name()) {
00063                 m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),true);
00064             QToolTip::add(this, m_module->name() );             
00065             break;
00066             }
00067         }
00068     }
00069     else {
00070         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00071             if (m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) == i18n("NONE") )
00072                 m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),true);
00073                 break;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }   
00077 
00079 QPixmap CModuleChooserButton::icon(){
00080     switch (m_moduleType) {
00081         case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00082             if (m_hasModule)
00083                 return BIBLE_ICON_MC;               
00084             else
00085                 return BIBLE_ADD_ICON_MC;
00086         case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00087             if (m_hasModule)
00088                 return COMMENTARY_ICON_MC;
00089             else
00090                 return COMMENTARY_ADD_ICON_MC;
00091         case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00092             if (m_hasModule)
00093                 return LEXICON_ICON_MC;             
00094             else
00095                 return LEXICON_ADD_ICON_MC;
00096         case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00097             if (m_hasModule)
00098                 return BOOK_ICON_MC;                
00099             else
00100                 return BOOK_ADD_ICON_MC;                
00101         default:
00102             return PARALLEL_ICON_MC;
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 CSwordModuleInfo* CModuleChooserButton::module() {      
00107     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00108         if ( m_popup->isItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i)) )
00109             return backend()->findModuleByName( m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) );
00110     }   
00111     return 0; //"none" selected
00112 }
00113 
00115 int CModuleChooserButton::getId() const{
00116     return m_id;
00117 }
00118 
00120 void CModuleChooserButton::moduleChosen( int ID ){  
00121     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++)
00122         m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),false);        
00123     m_popup->setItemChecked(ID, true);
00124     
00125     if (m_popup->text(ID) == i18n("NONE")) {
00126         if (m_hasModule) {
00127         emit sigRemoveButton(m_id);
00128         return;
00129         }
00130     }
00131     else {
00132       if (!m_hasModule)
00133         emit sigAddButton();
00134         m_hasModule = true;     
00135         m_module = module();
00136         setPixmap(icon());
00137         repaint();          
00138     emit sigChanged();
00139     
00140     QToolTip::remove(this);
00141     if (module())
00142         QToolTip::add(this, module()->name());
00143     }
00144 }
